instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3662: What is 820-3662? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
threads.message:
Hello, we got an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> with liquid damage that came in dead. Some line at the CPU power IC was burned we replaced and now it works again but with a slow mouse and high fanspin. Apple ASD gives 2 errors.

- Sensor Current IM0C DDR test 1
- Ts0P Palmrest

So far we have replaced a new trackpad with cable and tried without cam/wifi installed. We also replaced <CHIP>U5560</CHIP> although it looked good, no shorts there and all resistor measure OK.

Any other options? Customer is leaving tomorrow and I would be so sad if I made the mac work but cannot charge him :P

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
threads.message:
Post value for <SIGNAL>SMC_1V35MRM_ISENSE</SIGNAL>.
Check all resistors and traces of <CHIP>U5560</CHIP>.

Check <RESISTOR>R5370</RESISTOR>/71 and their traces to J4800.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
threads.message: Unfortunately I didnt have enough time, so this one can be closed :(

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
threads.message: Customer came back with this Mac so im back on it. Resistors have correct values and traces seem to be OK. I have only 0.6v on pin 5 of <CHIP>U5560</CHIP>, should be 3.3v correct? Thats also what i measure on <SIGNAL>SMC_1V35MRM_ISENSE</SIGNAL>. I do have 3.3v at J4800 so it is being created. No short on pin 5 of <CHIP>U5560</CHIP> as well, i measure 0.468.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
threads.message: I found <TRANSISTOR>Q8012</TRANSISTOR> missing from the board, so will replace that and hope that fixes it, will report back

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3662</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> high fan spin ASD errors after liquid
